name: Ghosts (sunnray)
description:
In this world the only currency is memories. Everything can be bought, everything can be sold.

You are a ghost without memories of your own. So what do you do?

You take them from humans of course. It’s not like they need that many anyway.

Features

  • You can move and jump.
  • LMB to command your friend to collect a memory.
  • There are positive and negative memories, they have varied effects.
